title: Share of mobile banking users among mobile phone owners in the U.S. 2009 to 2016
summary: In general Share of mobile banking users has rose over the Year.
Share of mobile banking users is roughly constant from 2009 to 2010, slightly increasing from 2010 to 2012, and finally roughly constant from 2012 to 2015.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
The highest Share of mobile banking users, of value 46.0 was reached at Year 2015
The lowest Share of mobile banking users, of value 18.0 was reported at Year 2009
